snippet: Six months after joining News Corporation to lead a push into the education market, Joel I. Klein became Rupert Murdoch’s legal compass in the phone-hacking scandal.
abstract: Joel I Klein’s involvement in helping News Corporation confront the phone-hacking scandal is delaying his own ambitions for improving the company’s efforts in education; Klein faces criticism for his seemingly contradictory roles within News Corporation, both investigating wrongdoing inside the company and advising Rupert Murdoch on handling public relations and his appearances before the British Parliament.
lead_paragraph: Six months after joining News Corporation to lead a push into the education market, Joel I. Klein became Rupert Murdoch’s legal compass in the phone-hacking scandal.
